items.name: A LA CARTE MENU
items.description: Leading our passionate team is seasoned executive chef, Sarahjane Brown. With a commitment to sourcing the freshest and the best produce in season, Sarahjane utilises locally sourced produce across all areas of the continually evolving contemporary menu, delivery a dining experience that is unique.

items.name: WINELIST MENU
items.description: A cleverly curated Australian focused wine list by sommelier Franck Gozé. An ever-evolving showcase of iconic and best boutique producers, balancing cutting-edge varietals with classic heroes. All the significant and emerging regions of Australia are well represented by the bottle and by-the-glass. Complementing the local specialities is an enviable Champagne list led by the House of Perrier-Jouët Our current wine list may change due to vintage changes, availability and season.

items.name: DESSERT MENU
items.description: The pastry team at Cafe Sydney possess a passion for the art of patisserie. Together with a focus on the best produce of the season delivering a changing dessert menu of quality classics, together with a playful interpretation.

items.name: COCKTAILS MENU
items.description: An irresistible mix of classics complemented by innovative cocktail creations, inspired by the freshest produce at the time. Perfect to enjoy in the Cafe Sydney lounge or in our restaurant Join us in the bar for a drink, a snack or an evening of both.

BITTERS ACOBIA (Piedmont, ITA)
items.description: This tangy, all-natural coloured bitter with an organic wine base includes thirteen herbs, fruits, and spices.

items.name: SELECT APERITIVO (Veneto, ITA)
items.description: Made by blending 30 botanicals including juniper berries, and rhubarb roots to create a sophisticated but still approachable bittersweet flavour.

items.name: CAPO CAPO APERITIVO (Trentino, FRA)
items.description: A classic Italian aperitivo made with bitter orange and rhubarb, and infused with a blend of Alpine herbs giving it a ruby-red colour.

items.name: AUTONOMY DAVO PLUM APERITIVO (Melbourne, AUS)
items.description: Tart Davidson Plum and Rosella are balanced by sweet Aussie oranges and a hint of Tasmanian Pepperberry.

items.name: CASONI 1814 APERITIVO (Emilia Romagna, ITA)
items.description: Bold and juicy-sweet on the palate, with a faint grapefruit-like bitterness and a floral touch on the long, elegant finish. Best served on the rocks with soda.

items.name: AMARO NONINO QUINTESSENTIA (Friuli, ITA)
items.description: Nonino are famed for their Grappa, but this is one of the most elegant amaros around. Caramel sweetness with gentle spice and orange peel.

items.name: AMARO MELETTI (Marche, ITA)
items.description: A lemony, chocolatey herbal Italian masterpiece.

items.name: VECCHIO AMARO DEL CAPO (Calabria, ITA)
items.description: From the toe of Italy’s boot, lightly bitter with floral sweetness. Best served very cold.

items.name: AMARO MARZADRO (Sicilia, ITA)
items.description: Cape Aloe, Alpine Rhubarb, Greater Gentian, Chamomile, Fennel, Holy Thistle, Galega, and different varieties of Yarrow are left to cold macerate for 20 to 30 days.

items.name: CAPPELLETTI TRENTINO (Trentino, ITA)
items.description: Where ‘Bistecca’ was born! A soft, nicely rounded and creamy-textured amaro with rich flavours of coffee beans, dark chocolate, citrus peel, peppermint, and vanilla.

items.name: Great Coffee takes gumption.
items.description: All along the chain of production, specialty coffee involves all manner of folk with gumption - gumption to identify that special plot of land and earmark it for a specific variety of coffee, to tough out the growing years, to nurture and wait, to say 'yes, we start picking now', to experiment with processing methods, and eventually the gumption to proudly present the coffee to buyers and say, 'this is my coffee.' Great coffee takes gumption on the part of the roaster to pick it on the cupping table and roast in ways that boldly express the intents of both grower and roaster. Baristas with gumption understand their place in this chain, know when to get out of the way, and let the coffee speak for itself. Customers with gumption know coffee's true value and where to find it. Gumption can be found at: Shop 11, The Strand Arcade Sydney NSW 2000 You can order drinks and coffee beans for pickup via Hey You ahead of time: https://heyyou.com.au/restaurant/7967/gumption-by-coffee-alchemy New users can use the promo code GET5N for $5 credit after spending $5 on your first order.

items.name: The Royal George
items.description: Make yourself at home at this English-style pub and catch a game, play some pool or simply settle in for a drink or two. Dimly lit, The Royal George has an easy warmth and old-world charm that makes it a great place to relax and share some classic pub food over a pint or two with friends. Head chef Martin Connolly’s menu includes hearty staples like pan-roasted salmon, chicken schnitzel and daily pasta specials, as well as tasty salads and burgers. Reminiscent of a rustic English pub with dark timber finishes, black leather Chesterfield lounges and a mounted deer head – it’s made for beer drinking.

items.name: Classic Aussie pub food - Fish and Chips
